=API for ns-utils=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.ns-utils))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_dir_nsname) dir] [#(_docs_nsname) docs] [#(_get-ns_ns-sym) get-ns] [#(_ns-vars_ns) ns-vars] [#(_print-dir_ns) print-dir] [#(_print-docs_ns) print-docs] [#(_vars_nsname) vars] 

----
===(`_`dir`_` nsname)===
====Macro====
<pre> Prints a sorted directory of public vars in a namespace</pre>
----
===(`_`docs`_` nsname)===
====Macro====
<pre> Prints documentation for the public vars in a namespace</pre>
----
===(`_`get-ns`_` ns-sym)===
<pre> Returns the namespace named by ns-sym or throws if the
namespace does not exist</pre>
----
===(`_`ns-vars`_` ns)===
<pre> Returns a sorted seq of symbols naming public vars in
a namespace</pre>
----
===(`_`print-dir`_` ns)===
<pre> Prints a sorted directory of public vars in a namespace</pre>
----
===(`_`print-docs`_` ns)===
<pre> Prints documentation for the public vars in a namespace</pre>
----
===(`_`vars`_` nsname)===
